00009 #ifndef BOOST_INTEROPERABLE_23022003THW_HPP
00010 # define BOOST_INTEROPERABLE_23022003THW_HPP
00011 
00012 # include <boost/mpl/bool.hpp>
00013 # include <boost/mpl/or.hpp>
00014 
00015 # include <boost/type_traits/is_convertible.hpp>
00016 
00017 # include <boost/iterator/detail/config_def.hpp> // must appear last
00018 
00019 namespace boost
00020 {
00021 
00022   //
00023   // Meta function that determines whether two
00024   // iterator types are considered interoperable.
00025   //
00026   // Two iterator types A,B are considered interoperable if either
00027   // A is convertible to B or vice versa.
00028   // This interoperability definition is in sync with the
00029   // standards requirements on constant/mutable container
00030   // iterators (23.1 [lib.container.requirements]).
00031   //
00032   // For compilers that don't support is_convertible 
00033   // is_interoperable gives false positives. See comments
00034   // on operator implementation for consequences.
00035   //
00036   template <typename A, typename B>
00037   struct is_interoperable
00038 # ifdef BOOST_NO_STRICT_ITERATOR_INTEROPERABILITY
00039     : mpl::true_
00040 # else
00041     : mpl::or_<
00042           is_convertible< A, B >
00043         , is_convertible< B, A > >
00044 # endif
00045   { 
00046   };
00047 
00048 } // namespace boost
00049 
00050 # include <boost/iterator/detail/config_undef.hpp>
00051 
00052 #endif // BOOST_INTEROPERABLE_23022003THW_HPP
